attributes.action: Remove Dance from the UK curriculum for students under 17
attributes.additional_details: Every child that I know has said that they absolutely hate having to dance and embarrass themselves in front of their classmates and that their self esteem drops significantly. I think that the children of our country should be learning something useful in the time they spend dancing. And does dance actually help your future? Thank you for your time.
attributes.background: Please click more details for information on this topic.
